resources.string:
This is your character! You can make him run around and the goal is to attack ghosts and collect coins 
 
 This is a ghost. You can press the red button below to kill them and earn points 
 
 This is the button you can press to send out a fireball to kill ghosts 
 
 This is a treasure chest that you can stand in front of, click your character and then get extra coins 
 
 This is a shield you can pick up that will protect you from the ghosts 
 
 Picking up coins will help you to increase your score 
 
 You get 6 lives, which means you can only let a ghost touch you six times before game over
Brought to you by Ryan, Julian, Alex, Zakey, and Davy.
University of Virginia CS 2110 Fall Semester
